tooltip.runic.bane_of_arthropods: Deal more damage to arthropod type enemies
tooltip.runic.fire_aspect: Sets targets on alight on hit
tooltip.runic.fire_protection: Reduces fire damage and burn time
tooltip.runic.impaling: Extra damage against aquatic type mobs
tooltip.runic.infinity: 50/50 chance to not consume an arrow
tooltip.runic.mending: Uses XP to repair the item
tooltip.runic.projectile_protection: Increased damage reduction against ranged weapons
tooltip.runic.protection: Increased damage reduction against mele weapons
tooltip.runic.riptide: Propels the player when thrown in water or rain
tooltip.runic.smite: Deal extra damage against undead enemies
tooltip.runic.soul_speed: Increased movement speed on soul blocks
tooltip.runic.sweeping_edge: Increases sweeping attack damage and radius
tooltip.runic.thorns: Deals a percentage of damage back to the attacker
tooltip.runic.vanishing_curse: The item will vanish on death
tooltip.runic.wind_burst: Summons a wind charge on attack
tooltip.runic.density: Deal more damage the higher you fall
tooltip.runic.lightning_aspect: % chance to summon lightning on hit
tooltip.runic.weakness_aspect: % chance to weaken enemy on hit
tooltip.runic.slowness_aspect: % chance to slowdown enemy on hit
tooltip.runic.poison_aspect: % chance to poison enemy on hit
tooltip.runic.skulk_smite: Deals extra damage to sculk creatures
tooltip.runic.soul_siphoner: Restores durability using XP from kills
tooltip.runic.fire_react: % chance to ignite attackers when hit
tooltip.runic.mystical_enlightenment: Boosts enchanting power of nearby tables
tooltip.runic.renewal: Gradually repairs the item over time
tooltip.runic.chill_aura: Slows nearby enemies with a freezing aura
tooltip.runic.potato_recovery: % chance to restore hunger with potatoes
